title: Static Analysis

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.
Certificate algorithm might be vulnerable to hash collision

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (org.wahtod.wififixer.ui.MainActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (org.wahtod.wififixer.boot.BootReceiver) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

metadata.cwe: CWE-312: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
metadata.description: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.

metadata.cwe: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
metadata.description: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings:
"privacy_part_3" : "Logging stores some personal information: specifically current timezone and SSID of configured access points and scanned SSIDs during connection. Logging is stored securely. The log will only be transmitted when explicitly requested.

Stack traces are collected upon an uncaught exception and added to the log. Stack traces contain no identifying information."
"servicealert_message" : "Cuando el servicio es deshabilitado tu Wifi no sera monitoreada o reparada"
"stuck_notif" : "Your Wifi is stuck. Please refer to Known Issues in Help"
"StateNotif_summary" : "Displays an ongoing notification showing connection state when service is enabled"

"gpl_part_2" : "This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details."

"gpl_part_1" : "This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version."

"dbmfloor_summary" : "Level at which Wifi Fixer scans for a better known network 
Default is recommended"
"tutorial_toast_6" : "Este es el area de Redes Cercanas"
"tutorial_toast_5" : "El area de redes conocidas muestra las redes que has añadido"
"donatenag" : "If you use this software, please donate!"
"phone_tutorial_q" : "Por favor toma un momento para un tutorial rapido de la interfaz"
"tutorial_toast_2" : "El area de Status muestra lo que Wifi Fixer y tu Wifi estan haciendo"
"issue_report_nag" : "El Reporte ed Incidencia debe ser llenado para enviar el registro"

"privacy_part_2" : "Information sent via email for support purposes is never shared with any third party. Your email address will never be used for any purpose other than product support.
"
"WifiLock_summary" : "Enables Wifi Lock: will increase battery use slightly"
"tutorial_toast_7" : "The Local Networks fragment shows networks around you"

"dbmfloor_summary" : "Nivel al cual Wifi Fixer busca una red conocida mejor 
Default es recomendado"
"SCREEN_summary" : "El servicio chequea la red cuando la pantalla esta apagada: usara un poco mas de bateria"
"critical_timeout" : "Comprobacion de Red fallida: tiempo de espera agotado"
"WAKELOCK_summary" : "La mayoria de los dispositivos funciona correctamente con esto habilitado. Reduce un poco el uso de bateria."
"network_at_priority_floor" : "Red en el fondo de la prioridad:"
"scan_mode" : "Should be in normal system scan mode"

"tutorial_toast_8" : "That's it!

If you want to run the tutorial again, go to Settings."
"SCREEN_summary" : "Service checks network when screen is off: will use slightly more battery"
"stuck_notif" : "Tu Wifi esta atascado. Por favor lee los Problemas Conocidos en la Ayuda"

"notpossible" : "It is not possible to prevent disconnections or low signal in an app. Wifi Fixer will detect and attempt recovery when these problems are detected. Some tuning can be done to the Wifi Acess Point's settings to minimize disconnections. Please refer to the in-app help documents.
"
"promo" : "Wifi Fixer works around several problems with Android wifi."
"issue_prompt" : "Please describe the issue. Be as specific as you can."
"tutorial_toast_9" : "Manten presionado cualquier item en esta lista para mas opciones"
"SLOG_summary" : "Outputs Wifi Fixer's diagnostic info to the Android debug log"
"tutorial_toast_7" : "El area de Redes Cercanas muestras las redes a tu alrededor"
"servicealert_message" : "When the service is disabled, your wifi is no longer monitored or repaired"
"WIDGET_summary" : "Cambia el comportamiento del Widget al tocarlo"
"SLEEP_POLICY_summary" : "Abre la configuracion avanzada de Wifi: Revisar los problemas conocidos"
"tutorial_toast_9" : "You can long-press the items in this list for more options"
"Notifications_summary" : "Muestra una notificacion cuando Wifi Fixer repara un problema"
"SLOG_summary" : "Comienza a capturar datos de los sensores de Wifi Fixer a la tarjeta sd"

"feedback" : "For problems or comments:
email with specific details, or use the in-app send log feature."
"WAKELOCK_summary" : "Most devices operate correctly with this enabled. Reduces battery use slightly."
"tutorial_toast_2" : "The Status fragment shows you what your WiFi and Wifi Fixer are doing"
"N1FIX2_summary" : "Experimental: Por favor lee la seccion politica Wifi durante suspension en los Problemas Conocidos de la Ayuda."

"privacy_part_1" : "Your Wifi password is never stored or transmitted. It is only used to create the Wifi Configuration
"
"WifiLock_summary" : "Habilita Wifi Lock: incrementara el uso de bateria levemente"
"tutorial_toast_4" : "Este es el area de Redes Conocidas"
"StateNotif_summary" : "Muestra una notificacion emergente mostrando el estado de la conexion cuando el servicio es habilitado"

"notpossible" : "It is not possible to prevent disconnections or low signal in an app. Wifi Fixer will detect and attempt recovery when these problems are detected Some tuning can be done to the Wifi Acess Point's settings to minimize disconnections. Please refer to the in-app help documents.
"

"tutorial_toast_8" : "Eso es todo!

Si deseas repasar el tutorial nuevamente, dirigete a Opciones."

"issue_prompt" : "Por favor describe el problema. Se tan especifico como puedas."
"Notifications_summary" : "Displays a notification when Wifi Fixer repairs a problem"
"tutorial_toast_3" : "Puedes pulsar, mantener presionado o deslizar hacia izquierda o derecha en la ventana para navegar, o usar las pestañas como botones"
"N1FIX2_summary" : "Experimental: please read Wifi Sleep Policy section of Known Issues in Help."
"Perf_Mode_summary" : "Ajusta automaticamente las opciones usando perfiles predeterminados"
"donatenag" : "Si consideras util este software, por favor considera donar."
"BLIST_summary" : "Deshabilita el hotspot wifi AT&T para evitar conectarse a el"
"BLIST_summary" : "Disables attwifi hotspot so it will not be connected to"

Please read the documentation for specifics.
"

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

high.title: Certificate algorithm might be vulnerable to hash collision
high.description: Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.

high.title: Launch Mode of Activity (org.wahtod.wififixer.ui.MainActivity) is not standard.
high.description: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.

high.title: Broadcast Receiver (org.wahtod.wififixer.NotificationReceiver) is not Protected.
high.description:
[android:exported=true]
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (org.wahtod.wififixer.boot.BootReceiver) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (org.wahtod.wififixer.WFBroadcastReceiver) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (org.wahtod.wififixer.widget.FixerWidget) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (org.wahtod.wififixer.widget.FixerWidgetSmall) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
warning.description:
Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#checking-memory-for-sensitive-data-mstg-storage-10

warning.title: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
warning.description:
App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#external-storage

warning.title: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
warning.description:
App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x04h-Testing-Code-Quality.md#injection-flaws-mstg-arch-2-and-mstg-platform-2

warning.title: This app may contain hardcoded secrets
warning.description:
The following secrets were identified from the app. Ensure that these are not secrets or private information.
"backup_key" : "THISISANEXAMPLEAPIKEYITWILLNOTWORK"
"dbmfloor_key" : "DBMFLOOR"
"dbmfloor_key" : "DBMFLOOR"

info.title: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
info.description:
The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#logs

secure.title: This application has no privacy trackers
secure.description: This application does not include any user or device trackers. Unable to find trackers during static analysis.

hotspot.title: Found 2 critical permission(s)
hotspot.description:
Ensure that these permissions are required by the application.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (dangerous): read/modify/delete external storage contents - Allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS (dangerous): modify global system settings - Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.
